content.raw:
I found a better fix for the segfault on shutdown problem, by enabling `shared_from_this()` in Model class 	eb7be78, and reverted changes to `World::Fini()`.

Restarting builds:

 - [homebres build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/585/)
 - [any devel build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/770/)
 - [coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/435/)
